title: Easy artichoke and prawn linguine
ingredients: ['225g wholewheat linguine', '4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '450g cooked and peeled prawns', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon crushed red chilli flakes', '1 (390g) tin artichoke hearts, drained and quartered', '8 tablespoons sliced black olives', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '8 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
